conclusion: Initial temperature in state A is 27°C.
Temperature in state B is 27°C due to isochoric process.
Volume changes from 1 × 10^-3 m^3 to 3 × 10^-3 m^3, pressure constant at 2 × 10^5 Pa from B to C.
Temperature in state C is 720 K using ideal gas law.
No heat transferred from A to B as temperature is constant.
Heat transferred from B to C calculated as 1.2 × 10^3 J.
Total heat transferred by the gas is 1.2 × 10^3 J.
